data.name: CharacterProperties
desc: This is a set of properties to describe the style of characters.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

types.name: CharInteropGrabBag
desc: Grab bag of character properties, used as a string-any map for interim interop purposes.
This property is intentionally not handled by the ODF filter. Any member that should be handled there should be first moved out from this grab bag to a separate property.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

types.name: CharStyleNames
desc: This optional property specifies the names of the all styles applied to the font.
It is not guaranteed that the order in the sequence reflects the order of the evaluation of the character style attributes.
**since**

properties.name: CharAutoKerning
desc: This optional property determines whether the kerning tables from the current font are used.
Automatic kerning applies a spacing in between certain pairs of characters to make the text look better.

properties.name: CharBackColor
desc: This optional property contains the text background color.

properties.name: CharBackTransparent
desc: This property determines if the text background color is set to transparent.

properties.name: CharBorderDistance
desc: This property contains the distance from the border to the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharBottomBorder
desc: This property contains the bottom border of the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharBottomBorderDistance
desc: This property contains the distance from the bottom border to the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharCaseMap
desc: This optional property contains the value of the case-mapping of the text for formatting and displaying.

properties.name: CharColor
desc: This property contains the value of the text color.

properties.name: CharCombineIsOn
desc: This optional property determines whether text is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombinePrefix and CharCombineSuffix.

properties.name: CharCombinePrefix
desc: This optional property contains the prefix (usually parenthesis) before text that is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombineIsOn and CharCombineSuffix.

properties.name: CharCombineSuffix
desc: This optional property contains the suffix (usually parenthesis) after text that is formatted in two lines.
It is linked to the properties CharCombineIsOn and CharCombinePrefix.

properties.name: CharContoured
desc: This optional property specifies if the characters are formatted and displayed with a contour effect.

properties.name: CharCrossedOut
desc: This property is TRUE if the characters are crossed out.

properties.name: CharEmphasis
desc: This optional property contains the font emphasis value.

properties.name: CharEscapement
desc: specifies the percentage by which to raise/lower superscript/subscript characters.
Negative values denote subscripts and positive values superscripts.

properties.name: CharEscapementHeight
desc: This is the relative height used for subscript or superscript characters in units of percent.
The value 100 denotes the original height of the characters.

properties.name: CharFlash
desc: If this optional property is TRUE, then the characters are flashing.

properties.name: CharFontCharSet
desc: This property contains the text encoding of the font.

properties.name: CharFontFamily
desc: This property contains font family.

properties.name: CharFontName
desc: This property specifies the name of the font style.
It may contain more than one name separated by comma.

properties.name: CharFontPitch
desc: This property contains the font pitch.

properties.name: CharFontStyleName
desc: This property contains the name of the font style.
This property may be empty.

properties.name: CharFontType
desc: This optional property specifies the fundamental technology of the font.

properties.name: CharHeight
desc: This value contains the height of the characters in point.

properties.name: CharHidden
desc: If this optional property is TRUE, then the characters are invisible.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: CharHighlight
desc: Determines the color of the highlight.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharKeepTogether
desc: This optional property marks a range of characters to prevent it from being broken into two lines.
A line break is applied before the range of characters if the layout makes a break necessary within the range.

properties.name: CharKerning
desc: This optional property contains the value of the kerning of the characters.

properties.name: CharLeftBorder
desc: This property contains the left border of the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharLeftBorderDistance
desc: This property contains the distance from the left border to the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharLocale
desc: This property contains the value of the locale.

properties.name: CharNoHyphenation
desc: This optional property determines if the word can be hyphenated at the character.

properties.name: CharNoLineBreak
desc: This optional property marks a range of characters to ignore a line break in this area.
A line break is applied behind the range of characters if the layout makes a break necessary within the range. That means that the text may go through the border.

properties.name: CharPosture
desc: This property contains the value of the posture of the document.

properties.name: CharRelief
desc: This optional property contains the relief style of the characters.

properties.name: CharRightBorder
desc: This property contains the right border of the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharRightBorderDistance
desc: This property contains the distance from the right border to the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharRotation
desc: This optional property determines the rotation of a character in tenths of a degree.
Depending on the implementation only certain values may be allowed.

properties.name: CharRotationIsFitToLine
desc: This optional property determines whether the text formatting tries to fit rotated text into the surrounded line height.

properties.name: CharScaleWidth
desc: This optional property determines the percentage value for scaling the width of characters.
The value refers to the original width which is denoted by 100, and it has to be greater than 0.

properties.name: CharShadingValue
desc: This optional property contains the text shading value.

properties.name: CharShadowFormat
desc: Determines the type, color, and width of the shadow.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharShadowed
desc: This optional property specifies if the characters are formatted and displayed with a shadow effect.

properties.name: CharStrikeout
desc: This property determines the type of the strike out of the character.

properties.name: CharStyleName
desc: This optional property specifies the name of the style of the font.

properties.name: CharTopBorder
desc: This property contains the top border of the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharTopBorderDistance
desc: This property contains the distance from the top border to the object.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: CharTransparence
desc: This is the transparency of the character text.
The value 100 means entirely transparent, while 0 means not transparent at all.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.0

properties.name: CharUnderline
desc: This property contains the value for the character underline.

properties.name: CharUnderlineColor
desc: This property contains the color of the underline for the characters.

properties.name: CharUnderlineHasColor
desc: This property specifies if the property CharUnderlineColor is used for an underline.

properties.name: CharWeight
desc: This property contains the value of the font weight.

properties.name: CharWordMode
desc: If this property is TRUE, the underline and strike-through properties are not applied to white spaces.

properties.name: HyperLinkName
desc: This optional property contains the name of the hyperlink.

properties.name: HyperLinkTarget
desc: This optional property contains the name of the target for a hyperlink.

properties.name: HyperLinkURL
desc: This optional property contains the URL of a hyperlink.

properties.name: RubyAdjust
desc: This optional property determines the adjustment of the ruby .

properties.name: RubyCharStyleName
desc: This optional property contains the name of the character style that is applied to RubyText.

properties.name: RubyIsAbove
desc: This optional property determines whether the ruby text is printed above/left or below/right of the text.
This property is replaced by RubyPosition.

properties.name: RubyPosition
desc: This optional property determines the position of the ruby .
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: RubyText
desc: This optional property contains the text that is set as ruby.

properties.name: TextUserDefinedAttributes
desc: This property stores XML attributes.
They will be saved to and restored from automatic styles inside XML files.

properties.name: UnvisitedCharStyleName
desc: This optional property contains the character style name for unvisited hyperlinks.

properties.name: VisitedCharStyleName
desc: This optional property contains the character style name for visited hyperlinks.
